price: 42 Allez, toi et ton frère, assistés de Mes signes, sans cesser d’invoquer Mon nom.
arabic: ٱذۡهَبۡ أَنتَ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔايَٰتِي وَلَا تَنِيَا فِي ذِكۡرِي

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: idh'hab anta wa-akhūka biāyātī walā taniyā fī dhik'rī
